location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has partially obscured the date leaving 19th Decem... 1807.

mods.abstract: The letter is explaining that the Resident has dispatched the HCC Nautilus, which is conveying a large packet to Fort William, Calcutta and that he has received intelligence regarding the arrival of French troops at Tabreezee [Tabriz].
